CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1952, pg. 33, reads: "Vice Presidential Candidate Greeted - The Republican bigwigs were out in full force at Syria Mosque when Vice Presidential nominee Richard Nixon visited Pittsburgh last week for a major address.  Here are Congressman Robert Corbett, Mrs. Patricia Nixon, Senator Edward Martin, Senator James Duff, the candidate, Governor John S. Fine and State Republican Chairman Harvey M. Taylor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Congressman Robert Corbett, Patricia "Pat" Nixon, Senator Edward Martin, Senator James Duff, vice presidential candidate Richard Nixon, Governor John S. Fine and State Republican Chairman Harvey M. Taylor, standing on stage in Syria Mosque
